website_summaries.verdict: These welder's sleeves are expertly crafted from superior materials for long-lasting durability.
pros: Bourbon-brown side-split cowhide sleeves will maintain their appearance for an extended period of time
Sewn with Kevlar thread to limit the risk of ripping and tearing
Made with external elastic at both ends, which means you should have no trouble securing the sleeves to your arms
cons: Elastic cuffs may be uncomfortable at times
Cut tends to run small, and the sleeves may not extend above the biceps for some users

customer_reviews.title: Feel like they will protect my arms
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately they ask to review a product before you get to really test it. The sleeves were delivered on time, as described, they seem very heavy duty and I thick they will work well for my tasks trimming many plants in the desert of Arizona with cactus spines, bougainvillea spines, spines on the end of agave leaves, etc..
customer_reviews.author: Dean C. Brick

customer_reviews.title: The answer to savage rose bushes
customer_reviews.text: Most of the items listed for use with rose bushes are woven cloths and will prevent scratches but not punctures. These sleeves allow me to reach inside a tangle of roses to trim them without scratches or unwanted acupuncture. They will leave bare arms an interesting shade of orange but that easily washes off. I highly recommend them for this "off label" purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Wombat Warlord

customer_reviews.title: No more crispy arms.
customer_reviews.text: Thee work great for me. They provide great protection when I am wearing a lighter jacket, or working in short sleeves. The dye does come off with perspiration, but other than that I really like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Savino

customer_reviews.title: Great for seniors arms when Gardening.
customer_reviews.text: Deliver is 5 star, 3 days from order, way quicker than promised. I am older and very thin skin, so I use these to protect my arms when gardening. Easy on and off and no more ugly cuts and bruising. Don't know why I didn't think of this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Telco-Ed

customer_reviews.title: The leather is good and the elastic isn't bad
customer_reviews.text: The leather is good and the elastic isn't bad. I cannot get these sleeves up to my bicep nut they fit better than Lincoln Electric's $9 sleeves, at least these are still usable. After awhile the elastic cuffs do get slightly uncomfortable, but while I'm welding it is of no concern.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Working good!
customer_reviews.text: These are really saving my shirt sleeves from sparks. I should’ve gotten them a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: First time buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These sleeves are well worth the money. I work in a welding shop where 50% of my work is over my head and these withstand some big sparks. The elastic band isn't too tight or too loose on my arms at least. I will purchase these again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepers creepers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for welding out in my non-air conditioned garage during the summer. These along with an old Carhart short sleeve t-shirt and the Hobart leather apron and I've got enough protection without overheating so much. I was using as light of a welding jacket as I could find and I was still sweating through it. Much more comfortable now.
customer_reviews.author: lonewolfz28

customer_reviews.title: i like these
customer_reviews.text: i find these perfect for light/medium mig welding. i usually wear them with a tee shirt or long sleeve. they fit nicely at the upper arm and wrist. very flexible. my miller gloves fit over them at the wrists nice. i do not think they are meant to fit over a jacket or anything heavier than a shirt.
customer_reviews.author: franz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our son. He does pipe welding. He said they work great
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Good product ,Good product, people in Puerto Rico love this item
customer_reviews.text: Good product ,Good product, people in Puerto Rico love this item
customer_reviews.author: BRUNO

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Good for when you don’t want to throw on a full jacket
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Overall very nice product! The elastic is a little snug.
customer_reviews.author: David  H.

customer_reviews.title: Very protective
customer_reviews.text: Very protective but they do get hot. A little snug on the top but better than being too loose. I wish I had these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: GJB56

customer_reviews.title: perfect for hot days
customer_reviews.text: If you TIG weld and want to avoid sunburnt arms use these. I like 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Marchione

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit on arms
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only issue is if you have larger arms they are a bit tight.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Usually last me a good while. Will buy again thanks.
customer_reviews.author: S.Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Best welding gear ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had them for over a year and still in good shape!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wear these when I am clearing heavy brush and vines. Prevents scratches and tears on my arms.
customer_reviews.author: Cw Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Provides good arm protection
customer_reviews.text: I use these when I'm trimming my bushes. They work great - no more scratched up arms.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Good sleeves.
customer_reviews.text: They serve their purpose. Heavy weight, stitching up top could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: These are Great!
customer_reviews.text: These fit good, the elastic is good and holds them up good and tight. read some reviews here and was not sure they would fit as I am 6'5" 300lbs. but they fit very well, the go from my wrist all the way to the arm pit and stay there. that is including the long sleeve uniform shirt I wear with them. great item will buy more when needed
customer_reviews.author: Josh Mills

customer_reviews.title: It does the job...
customer_reviews.text: They are great. The only issue is if you have a big hands it would be tie.
customer_reviews.author: christodoulos

customer_reviews.title: Love these sleeves
customer_reviews.text: These sleeves were for my dad to use when he is working on his acreage. The briars are thick and can only use a push brush hog. Comes in with arms bruised and cut. These fit him perfectly and were a great protection. He called and said the best gift ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kay M.Crump

customer_reviews.title: Great product to have
customer_reviews.text: Was given as gift to son in law and he love it. He has a full jacket and he says it gets very hot, having the sleeves is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alesia J. Sipes

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Summer in AZ is brutal and being covered in leather to weld is tough. These leather sleeves are simple to use and offer great protection for arms nearly to the shoulder. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: RWM50

customer_reviews.title: need larger upper-arm opening
customer_reviews.text: While the sleeves themselves are O/K and work as intended, they are cut far too small in the upper arm/bicep area. I will be selling these to a co-worker and have ordered a pair of Miller sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: ... the correct sleeves from APEX and they fit absolutely fantastic! The elastic bands make these sleeves worth every ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the correct sleeves from APEX and they fit absolutely fantastic! The elastic bands make these sleeves worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sleeves. I use them for fencing and cutting timber.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK RENNIE

customer_reviews.title: Total coverage
customer_reviews.text: These sleeves do cover both of my arms. That is exactly what I needed. Goodby scratched fore arms after splitting firewood. And I still can wear gloves to cover my hands.
customer_reviews.author: de Heiri

customer_reviews.title: Your arms get the color of the material. But comes off in the shower.
customer_reviews.text: I put them on in the summer to protect me from poison ivy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great leather, but not really happy with the elastic bands though, they melt and stretch out rather quickly
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I wear them under the welding jacket. It is easy to put them under then over the clothes. Now my arms aren't getting burned by sparks.
customer_reviews.author: Jagwolf

customer_reviews.title: NO burns
customer_reviews.text: They do what they are suppose to do very well.
customer_reviews.author: TL Parrish

customer_reviews.title: ... arms will survive another day lol this is a great product
customer_reviews.text: My arms will survive another day lol this is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: For more than just welding!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect length for me. Elastic at both ends is just right--holds in place without cutting off circulation. NOTE: I do *not* use this for welding. I use the sleeves (along with leather gloves) to protect myself when I'm pruning my roses but especially to protect me when pruning my fence hedge of Trifoliate orange (which has 3-inch thorns that are vicious).
customer_reviews.author: Terri Phelan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and durable, excellent price for quality of product. Definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barbecue arm guards.
customer_reviews.text: Will check them out during an upcoming charity barbecue. My wrists have gotten fried in previous years standing over the grill for six hours. Maybe this year my arm hairs will survive and I won't be as cooked as the chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my nephew for Christmas and he loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Ellefson

customer_reviews.title: protects my son's arms
customer_reviews.text: My son is taking welding classes. He says that these have been the best item we have purchased to protect his arms. I can't ask for anything more.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy D

product_meta.title: Tillman 5218E Heavyweight 18" Sleeves Cowhide Side Split Leather
product_meta.description: Bourbon brown side split cowhide sleeves. 18” length. Includes adjustable strap on top and adjustable snap on the wrist. Sewn with Kevlar thread. WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals which is [are] known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm.
feature_bullets: Bourbon tan brown side split cowhide sleeves.
2 1/4” external elastic at both ends secure sleeve on arm.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars82 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
